    public class GridDhtAtomicUpdateRequest
extends GridDhtAtomicAbstractUpdateRequest
    Lite dht cache backup update request.

                                  UUID nodeId,
                                  long futId,
                                  GridCacheVersion writeVer,
                                  CacheWriteSynchronizationMode syncMode,
                                  @NotNull
                                  AffinityTopologyVersion topVer,
                                  UUID subjId,
                                  int taskNameHash,
                                  Object[] invokeArgs,
                                  boolean addDepInfo,
                                  boolean keepBinary,
                                  boolean skipStore,
                                  boolean forceTransformBackups)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        cacheId - Cache ID.
        nodeId - Node ID.
        futId - Future ID.
        writeVer - Write version for cache values.
        invokeArgs - Optional arguments for entry processor.
        syncMode - Cache write synchronization mode.
        topVer - Topology version.
        keepBinary - Keep binary flag.
        skipStore - Skip store flag.
        forceTransformBackups - Force transform backups flag.
        subjId - Subject ID.
        taskNameHash - Task name hash code.
        addDepInfo - Deployment info.
